title: Dan Klein on The Theory of Moral Sentiments, Episode 2--A Discussion of Part I
description: This is the second podcast in the EconTalk Book Club discussion of The Theory of Moral Sentiments by Adam Smith. In this episode, Dan Klein of George Mason University and EconTalk host Russ Roberts discuss Part I of the book.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (Library of Economics and Liberty)
content:encoded: This is the second podcast in the EconTalk Book Club discussion of The Theory of Moral Sentiments by Adam Smith. In this episode, Dan Klein of George Mason University and EconTalk host Russ Roberts discuss Part I of the book.
